DataElement.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Informed Consent Not Obtained Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text response that indicates the reason that a patient was not consented to received therapy after disease progression occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Informed Consent Negation Obtain
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The worsening of a disease over time._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._To come into possession of something.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Informed Consent
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:The worsening of a disease over time.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:To come into possession of something. (Concept includes term form "Obtained")

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
To come into possession of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If No, specify reason treatme
ReferenceDocuments.description: If No, specify reason treatment beyond progression consent not obtained
